statement.p: Out of the last 41 days, it rained 11 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{11}}{{41}}={0.26829268292683}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.26829268292683}={26.829268292683} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 26.83 .
